,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo;QPF4519;Q, QPF4519, 5EHD;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = PHICOMM_XX, PHICOMM_XX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/21/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B075TJ8VNH |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Phicomm WLAN-2318 |rad1modif = PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83523M;Intel, WAV500, S6504L09, SLLQH; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Phicomm WLAN-2318 |rad2modif = PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83513M;Intel, WAV500, S7054L36, SLLVN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Intel Innovation" is printed on the outside of the case. :Web GUI: http://p.to The chip IDs are not visible in the FCC photos. :[[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV523 based. Chips generally resemble :the WAV524 visible in the [[ASUS Blue Cave]] FCC photos. ===Model Version=== *Phicomm K3C (A1, C1, C2, S1(VIE1)) - for non-China *Phicomm K3C (B1, B1G, B2) - for China ;(B1/B1G/C1/C2/S1(VIE1)): *"800002313" and "V1.0" is silkscreened on the [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172221fhtj3b3bizeesggb.jpg main board]. *"800002318" and "V1.2" is silkscreened on the [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172221pssszd0n3aae051y.jpg wireless module]. :A single [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172218butjujilgdizk5jr.jpg daughter board] (PCIe x1) contains both Wi-Fi module. ;(A1/B2): *"800002470" and "V1.3" is silkscreened on only one the [https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/04/200951ubdij0i99o94zz99.jpg main board]. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [https://ark.intel.com/products/92553/Intel-AnyWAN-GRX350-Network-Processors GRX350] @800MHz Dual Core (MIPS [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lantiq-announces-carrier-class-network-processing-for-home-gateway-300050735.html interAptiv]) *Wireless chipset: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [http://www.intel.la/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/xway-wi-fi-chipset-wav500-series-brief.pdf WAV500] (PSB83513M/PSB83523M) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 600Mbps for 2.4GHz, 1300Mbps for 5GHz *PCIe x1 single daughter board ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33190-phicomm-k3c-ac1900-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Phicomm K3C AC1900 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://post.smzdm.com/p/556934/ ''Phicomm K3'' on '''smzdm.com'''] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-120959-1-1.html ''Phicomm K3C (B1)'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4583EL1600 - S7013N52 (SLLFB) ([http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172222hxmjy3exe3eesdxl.jpg CPU image]) :B2:([https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/02/213103xvqnqxfds3lxynel.jpg main board])([https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/02/213104i3qwjqoeq0qhkzob.jpg main board]) ===News=== *[https://newsroom.intel.com/news/intel-advances-home-connectivity-lay-foundation-smart-home/ ''Intel Advances Home Connectivity to Lay
the Foundation for Smart Home'' on '''Intel'''] *[http://blogs.intel.com/iot/2017/05/30/home-connectivity-reimagined/ ''Home Connectivity Reimagined'' on '''Intel'''] ==See also== *[[Phicomm K3]] - AC3150 Smart Wi-Fi Router (2167+1000Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709 @1.4GHz (Cortex A9), RAM: 512MB :3.5" TFT LCD Display, "800002240" V1.0 PCB (4T4R PA/LNA) *[[Phicomm K3C]] - AC1900 Smart Wi-Fi Router (1300+600Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4583EL @800MHz (GRX350), RAM: 256MB *[[Phicomm K2]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/65.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2C]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/73.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2P]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 64MB *[[Phicomm K2T]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/125.html PPage] *[[Phicomm KE 2P]] - AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/124.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2 Mini]] (32MB) - N300 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/120.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/66.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1S]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/68.html PPage] [[Category:English Documentation]]
